scripts.start: vite --clearScreen false & cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server/index.js
scripts.test: vite --clearScreen false --mode test & cross-env NODE_ENV=test nodemon server/index.js
scripts.pkg:app: rm -rf "$npm_package_name.app" && cp -r "scripts/template.app" ".tmp-pkg/$npm_package_name.app" && mv ".tmp-pkg/$npm_package_name" ".tmp-pkg/$npm_package_name.app/Contents/Resources/" && cp .env ".tmp-pkg/$npm_package_name.app/Contents/Resources/.env" && cp -r public ".tmp-pkg/$npm_package_name.app/Contents/Resources/public" && mv ".tmp-pkg/$npm_package_name.app" .
scripts.pkg:output:
echo "
Project successfully packaged.
Go to $npm_package_homepage/releases/tag/$npm_package_version to attach package.zip to the $npm_package_version tag"
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg:cleanup && npm run pkg:binaries && npm run pkg:app && npm run pkg:cleanup && npm run pkg:output
